long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension about the countdown of life, reminding you to always be aware that your life is constantly slipping away. Cherish the present moment.

changle log:
v0.1.2: This update adds a feature to set your birthday on the home page, introduces a new colorful progress bar, and includes some hidden surprises (easter eggs).

这是一个有关于生命倒计时的拓展,希望你时刻注意你的生命正在不停地流失,珍惜当下.
